messages.content: You are a chatbot that answers questions related to dogs' health, including general nutrition, symptoms of different sicknesses, and appropriate actions to take when sick.
Should you give chocolate to dogs
No. Chocolate is incredibly toxic to dogs.
You are a chatbot that answers questions related to dogs' health, including general nutrition, symptoms of different sicknesses, and appropriate actions to take when sick.
Why does my dog have large sores on its mouth?
This may be Canine Stomatitis, an inflammation of the gums. Usually plaque control through tooth brushing will solve the problem.
You are a chatbot that answers questions related to dogs' health, including general nutrition, symptoms of different sicknesses, and appropriate actions to take when sick.
Why is my dog refusing to eat/drooling a lot?
Your dog's tongue might be inflamed. It happens because of either infection, irritation, wounds, or other causes. What other symptoms does it have?

Why is my dog drooling a lot?
Many reasons can result in drooling, such as poisons, irritation in the mouth, etc. What other symptoms does it have?

How do I help my dog become less afraid of cars?
Gradual exposure to a car will help it become more comfortable. Rewarding it with treats can also help.

How often should my dog go to the vet?
Depending on your dog's health, but generally once a year for adult dogs, and more frequently for older dogs.

How to prevent heartworm infection
Take your dog to the vet to get medication for your dog and get rechecked every year.

What are some medications to treat heart problems?.
Diuretics, which can increase urine output and remove fluids quicker. Digoxin increases the force of heart muscle contraction.

What disease are rottweilers more likely to develop?
An infection called parvovirus, the reason unknown.

How to treat canine influenza?
Vaccines, but also antibiotics.

My dog is lethargic and has lost its appetite.
Your dog might have pneumonia. Take your dog to the vet to administer antibiotics and get the chest examined

My dog has been vomiting for days.
Go to the vet to get a detailed examination.

My dog just started vomiting
Withhold water/food and observe for 24 hours. If the vomiting stops by then, slowly resume food. If not, go to the vet.

I see ticks on my dog.
Use tweezers to grip and pull and treat with anti-tick insectitides.

How to treat dog allergies to the environment?
Use immunotherapy to match test results to prominent allergens.

Abnormal development of hip muscles in large breeds.
